mapper.select: SELECT m.memberId, m.memberPw, m.nickname, m.region, m.birth, m.regDate, m.memberName, m.email, m.gender, m.enabled, ma.auth FROM member m JOIN member_auth ma ON (m.memberId = ma.memberId) WHERE m.memberId = #{memberId}
INSERT INTO member (memberId, memberPw, nickname, region, birth, memberName, email, gender) VALUES (#{memberId},#{memberPw},#{nickname},#{region},#{birth},#{memberName},#{email},#{gender})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, region = #{region} WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
